title: Group portrait of groom wearing moustache and military uniform with Airman First Class patch on right sleeve, standing with bride, wearing veil, earrings, two strand necklace, light colored wedding dress with scalloped collar, sheer shoulders, lace sleeves, and skirt with floral embroidery, holding knife in right hand, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth, candles, and five tiered wedding cake in interior with posters, including one on left that reads "The Bible..." and one on right that reads "The Way of... of the Dark...", possibly for Stunt wedding, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
